distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for screen fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2015-6806: Fixed a stack overflow due to deep recursion (bsc#944458).

Non-security issue fixed:

- Fixed segmentation faults related to altscreen and resizing screen (bsc#1130831).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The MScrollV function in ansi.c in GNU screen 4.3.1 and earlier does not properly limit recursion, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack consumption) via an escape sequence with a large repeat count value.
notes.title: CVE description
